"As you command Megatron." Megaton wasn't convinced that Megatron was as
confident about his position as he had appeared. His DNA donor had loyal
followers but he could still be overthown when the time was right. Megatron
was the old model, the time was near for him to be replaced with the new
improved version. "Lead the way megatron." he stated, not allowing Megatron
to stab him in the back. Megaton looked around thinking about the odds. Soon
the odds wouldn't matter since he'd been given a rank and title for the
other Predacons to follow.
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 11:20 AM
Subject: Battle

an

>

>     Megatron was finally going to strech his legs after beening cooped up
in
